title: In 'Silk Road' Trial, FBI Paints Picture Of 'True Drug Empire'
teaser: The Silk Road was an online anonymous black market for buying and selling illegal drugs. The FBI shut it down in 2013 and now the man accused of running that billion-dollar drug market is on trial.
contentencoded:
The Silk Road was an online anonymous black market for buying and selling illegal drugs. The FBI shut it down in 2013 and now the man accused of running that billion-dollar drug market is on trial. Audie Cornish speaks with Wired reporter Andy Greenberg.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
